body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Michael Bryant and I work for SafeCar Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Stephanie Butler.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Stephanie. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having a security concern with my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide me with the last four digits of your order number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the last four digits are zero three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Stephanie. Additionally, could you confirm the name of the sales representative you worked with during the purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, his name is Alex Thompson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Stephanie. We will look into the security concern immediately.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Stephanie. Have a great day.
